selected_quotes: Link below to article on effect of stress and fatigue on police memory
Effects of stress fatigue on police response recall
Bit late, but just read wonderful paper by @lorraine_hope on impact of stress/fatigue on officer performance/recall
Stress affects armed police. Prof Hope tells you how. #UniverstyImpact #ICRFP @UoPScience
Excellent article and thank you for continuing to expand upon this area

citation.journal: Journal of Applied Research in Memory and Cognition
citation.title: Evaluating the Effects of Stress and Fatigue on Police Officer Response and Recall: A Challenge for Research, Training, Practice and Policy
